content.html: When I just started out, a Serious Business Guy looked me up and down, saw my jeans & t-shirt, scoffed, and said "bit of friendly advice, mate. Dress for the job you want - not the job you have." If anything, I've got scruffier just to spite him.
content.value:
When I just started out, a Serious Business Guy looked me up and down, saw my jeans & t-shirt, scoffed, and said "bit of friendly advice, mate. Dress for the job you want - not the job you have."

If anything, I've got scruffier just to spite him.
